channel.title: hugo-site on Andrea Rau, PhD
channel.description: Recent content in hugo-site on Andrea Rau, PhD

item.title: Applications in animal, plant, and human genomics
item.description: My methodological research is strongly motivated by applications in human, animal, and plant genomics. I have made strong efforts to contribute analyses and develop methods that can provide useful solutions in these areas. Animal genomics applications Débare, H., Blanc, F., Piton, G., Leplat, J.-J., Vincent-Naulleau, S., Rivière, J., Vilotte, M., Marthey, S., Lecardonnel, J., Coville, J.-L., Estellé, J., Rau, A., Bournef, E., and Egidy, G.

item.title: Multi-omic data integration
item.description: Related software rpl: Randomized pairwise likelihood method for complex statistical inferences 🔗 padma: Pathway deviation scores using multiple factor analysis 🔗 Regeneration Rosetta: An R/Shiny interactive web application to explore regeneration-associated gene expression and chromatin accessibility 🔗 maskmeans: Multi-view aggregation/splitting K-means clustering algorithm 🔗 Edge in TCGA: An R/Shiny interactive web application for the exploration of drivers of gene expression in The Cancer Genome Atlas 🔗 Related publications Mazo, G.

item.title: Network inference
item.description: Related software ebdbNet: Empirical Bayes estimation for dynamic Bayesian networks 🔗 Related publications Monneret, G., Jaffrézic, F., Rau, A., Zerjal, T. and Nuel, G. (2017) Identification of marginal causal relationships in gene networks from observational and interventional expression data. PLoS One, 12(3): e0171142. 🔗 📄 🔢 Monneret, G., Jaffrézic, F., Rau, A., Nuel, G. (2015) Estimation d’effets causaux dans les réseaux de régulation génique : vers la grande dimension.

item.title: RNA-seq co-expression
item.description: Related software coseq: Co-expression analysis of sequencing data 🔗 ICAL: Model selection for model based clustering of annotated data 🔗 HTSCluster: Clustering high-throughput sequencing data with Poisson mixture models 🔗 Related publications Godichon-Baggioni, A., Maugis-Rabusseau, C. and Rau, A. (2019) Clustering transformed compositional data using K-means, with applications in gene expression and bicycle sharing system data. Journal of Applied Statistics, 46(1):47-65.

item.title: Outreach
item.description: 👩‍🍳How to cook knowledge with #BigData? @andreamrau, researcher of @GeneSwitch project, explains why Big Data🖥️ is becoming important in #AnimalBreeding🧬 😋Check out our tasty recipe and learn more: https://t.co/2YJiXcPFuD 🇪🇺@CORDIS_EU #Genomics #Livestock pic.twitter.com/IrLKr0aucj — GENE-SWitCH (@GeneSwitch) November 3, 2022 Nos chercheurs sont là pour vous tout le week end à @ENS_ParisSaclay pour la fête de la science #FDS2022 Ils vous parleront notamment de l’adaptation des animaux à la chaleur, la science des données et l’ADN.
